contentfulProduct.seoDescription: The little sister to the long sherpa jacket, this cropped design has a slightly boxy silhouette with a flattering cut. Made from 100% polyester, it features a relaxed fit for comfort and pockets to carry your daily (small) treasures.
contentfulProduct.title: Recycled Sherpa Chore Jacket

content.value: The little sister to the long sherpa jacket, this cropped design has a slightly boxy silhouette with a flattering cut. Made from 100% recycled polyester, it features a relaxed fit for comfort and pockets to carry your daily (small) treasures.
Material: 100% Recycled Polyester fleece

Made from recycled plastic bottles in a mill certified by GRS (Global Recycle System) to help dramatically lower the environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
Bluesign速 & OEKO-TEX速 certified
Thermal insulation fleece fabric
Relaxed fit, slightly cropped silhouette
Standing mock-neck collar for extra warmth
Patch pockets and hidden side pockets with YKK zipper
Origin: Fabric produced in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Garment produced in Hai Duong City, Vietnam.
Model is 5'7" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash cold, inside out with like colors.  Do not use fabric softener.  Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low, do not iron, do not dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 100% Recycled Polyester fleece
  • Made from recycled plastic bottles in a mill certified by GRS (Global Recycle System) to help dramatically lower the environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
  • Bluesign速 & OEKO-TEX速 certified
  • Thermal insulation fleece fabric
  • Relaxed fit, slightly cropped silhouette
  • Standing mock-neck collar for extra warmth
  • Patch pockets and hidden side pockets with YKK zipper
  • Origin: Fabric produced in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Garment produced in Hai Duong City, Vietnam.
  • Model is 5'7" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: The little sister to the long sherpa jacket, this cropped design has a slightly boxy silhouette with a flattering cut. Made from 100% recycled polyester, it features a relaxed fit for comfort and pockets to carry your daily (small) treasures.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! Its now a reality  in 10 colors  thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like Im Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
